

#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(l,m) for(l=0;l<(m);l++)
#define RFOR(k,n) for(i=(n-1);i>=k;i--)
int main(){
    int t,n,i=0;
    cin>>t;
    FOR(i,t){
        cin>>n;
        if(n%6==0){
            cout<<"Misha"<<endl;
        }else{
            cout<<"Chef"<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;

}
